mapper.insert: Insert into WeekPlan (seq, toDo, pdate) VALUES (weekseq.nextVal, #{toDo}, TO_DATE(#{pdate},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select SEQ, TODO, TO_CHAR(PDATE,'MM-DD') as PDATE from WeekPlan where PDATE BETWEEN sysdate-1 AND sysdate+7 order by PDATE asc
mapper.insert: Insert into MonthPlan (seq, toDo, pdate) VALUES (monthseq.nextVal, #{toDo}, TO_DATE(#{pdate},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select SEQ, TODO, TO_CHAR(PDATE,'MM-DD') as PDATE from MonthPlan where PDATE BETWEEN sysdate-1 AND sysdate+30 order by PDATE asc
